name: fixedMinePoolProxy
description: FNX period mine pool. A smart-contract which distribute some mine coins when user stake FPT-A and FPT-B coins.

eventDecorators.name: ChangeLockedPeriod
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: DistributePremium
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: LockAirDrop
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: RedeemMineCoin
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: RedeemPremium
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: StakeFPTA
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: StakeFPTB
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: UnstakeFPTA
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

eventDecorators.name: UnstakeFPTB
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the work extra gas amount is changed.

functionDecorators.name: changeFPTBLockedPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Add FPT-B locked period. lockedPeriod FPT-B locked preiod number.

functionDecorators.name: delegateToImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Delegates execution to the implementation contract. It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts.

functionDecorators.name: delegateToViewImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Delegates execution to an implementation contract. It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts There are an additional 2 prefix uints from the wrapper returndata, which we ignore since we make an extra hop.

functionDecorators.name: distributePremium
functionDecorators.description: Distribute premium from foundation. periodID period ID amount premium amount.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentPeriodID
functionDecorators.description: getting current mine period ID.

functionDecorators.name: getFPTAAddress
functionDecorators.description: getting function. Retrieve FPT-A coin's address.

functionDecorators.name: getFPTBAddress
functionDecorators.description: getting function. Retrieve FPT-B coin's address.

functionDecorators.name: getImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Tells the address of the current implementation.

functionDecorators.name: getMineInfo
functionDecorators.description: retrieve minecoin distributed informations. mineCoin mineCoin address.

functionDecorators.name: getMineWeightRatio
functionDecorators.description: getting whole pool's mine production weight ratio. Real mine production equals base mine production multiply weight ratio.

functionDecorators.name: getMinerBalance
functionDecorators.description: retrieve user's mine balance. account user's account mineCoin mineCoin address.

functionDecorators.name: getPeriodFinishTime
functionDecorators.description: convert period ID to period's finish timestamp. periodID period ID.

functionDecorators.name: getPeriodIndex
functionDecorators.description: convert timestamp to period ID. _time timestamp.

functionDecorators.name: getStartTime
functionDecorators.description: getting function. Retrieve mine pool's start time.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalDistribution
functionDecorators.description: getting whole pool's mine shared distribution. All these distributions will share base mine production.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalMined
functionDecorators.description: retrieve total distributed mine coins. mineCoin mineCoin address.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalPremium
functionDecorators.description: retrieve total distributed premium coins.

functionDecorators.name: getUserCurrentAPY
functionDecorators.description: Calculate user's current APY. account user's account. mineCoin mine coin address.

functionDecorators.name: getUserExpired
functionDecorators.description: getting user's locked expired time. After this time user can unstake FPTB coins. account user's account.

functionDecorators.name: getUserFPTABalance
functionDecorators.description: getting user's staking FPT-A balance. account user's account.

functionDecorators.name: getUserFPTBBalance
functionDecorators.description: getting user's staking FPT-B balance. account user's account.

functionDecorators.name: getUserLatestPremium
functionDecorators.description: get user's premium balance. account user's account.

functionDecorators.name: getUserMaxPeriodId
functionDecorators.description: getting user's maximium locked period ID. account user's account.

functionDecorators.name: getWhiteList
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: isEligibleAddress
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible. tmpAddress input address for testing.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: lockAirDrop
functionDecorators.description: Air drop to user some FPT-B coin and lock one period and get distribution for mining. user air drop's recieptor. ftp_b_amount FPT-B amount that transfer into mine pool.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: redeemMinerCoin
functionDecorators.description: user redeem mine rewards. mineCoin mine coin address amount redeem amount.

functionDecorators.name: redeemOut
functionDecorators.description: foundation redeem out mine coins. mineCoin mineCoin address amount redeem amount.

functionDecorators.name: redeemPremium
functionDecorators.description: user redeem his options premium rewards.

functionDecorators.name: redeemPremiumCoin
functionDecorators.description: user redeem his options premium rewards. amount redeem amount.

functionDecorators.name: removeWhiteList
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist. removeAddress revoked address.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setMineCoinInfo
functionDecorators.description: Set mineCoin mine info, only foundation owner can invoked. mineCoin mineCoin address _mineAmount mineCoin distributed amount _mineInterval mineCoin distributied time interval.

functionDecorators.name: stakeFPTA
functionDecorators.description: Stake FPT-A coin and get distribution for mining. amount FPT-A amount that transfer into mine pool.

functionDecorators.name: stakeFPTB
functionDecorators.description: Stake FPT-B coin and lock locedPreiod and get distribution for mining. amount FPT-B amount that transfer into mine pool. lockedPeriod locked preiod number.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferProxyOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer ownership.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: unstakeFPTA
functionDecorators.description: withdraw FPT-A coin. amount FPT-A amount that withdraw from mine pool.

functionDecorators.name: unstakeFPTB
functionDecorators.description: withdraw FPT-B coin. amount FPT-B amount that withdraw from mine pool.
